```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)

```
```{r data cleaning, include=FALSE}
NY<-data|>
  filter(str_detect(city, regex("New York", ignore_case = TRUE)))


clean<-
  data|>
  janitor::clean_names()|>
  filter(str_detect(categories, regex("restaurant", ignore_case = TRUE))) 

clean |>
   group_by(state) |>
  summarize(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))

PA<-
  clean|>
  filter(state == "PA") 
unique(PA$city)
category_summar<-
  PA |>
  separate_rows(categories, sep = ",\\s*")|>
  group_by(categories) |>
  summarize(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))

print(category_summary)

write.csv(PA, "PA.csv", row.names = FALSE)

```
